traits.name: Surprise Attack
traits.description: If hitting a Surprised creature, +7 (2d6) damage.

actions.name: Morningstar
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 11 (2d8+2) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.description: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. Hit: 9 (2d6+2) Piercing damage.
